name: Murder on the Train Jam Express
name_original: Murder on the Train Jam Express
description:
PLAY IN BROWSER HERE

In the 48 hours before GDC, strangers bonded over making games on the TrainJam Express. The revelry was crushed by a mysterious murder… with no body to be found. But where did it happen, and how? And most importantly, who is the murderer???

That’s where you come in. Please, bring light to this very real tragedy. Try to find the one real solution to this murder.

Features:

  • Terrier-turkey lead detective
  • Angry banana-man
  • Romance, jealousy, and other human emotions
  • Sweet parallax background movement
  • Lots and lots of words
  • MURDER
  • 27 DIFFERENT ENDINGS (SERIOUSLY!)

Team: Morgan Brantner, Marjory Quail, Leslie Murphy, Ben Schiffler, Justin Larrabee, Michael McNabola, and Logan Colla.

PLAY IN BROWSER HERE
